education.institution: University of Texas at Austin – McCombs School of Business

work_habits.communication_style: Primarily async with brief syncs when needed
work_habits.response_time_expectation: Within 2 business hours for email/Slack, immediate for urgent chat
work_habits.meeting_preferences: Limits meetings to ≤2 hours per day; prefers 30‑minute stand‑ups and weekly 1‑hour strategy sessions
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (2 office days, 3 remote days per week)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: Three 2‑hour focus blocks per week, protected from meetings

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven with stakeholder input; favors structured analysis before committing
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate – willing to pilot new sourcing tools but seeks measurable ROI
personality.collaboration_style: Structured and goal‑oriented; sets clear expectations and follows up
personality.stress_management_approach: Morning run, weekly yoga, and scheduled micro‑breaks

availability.other_commitments: Speaker at two industry conferences per year; occasional mentoring webinars
availability.travel_flexibility: Up to 25 % travel (recruiting events, university tours)

personal_factors.caregiving_responsibilities: Morning childcare drop‑off/pick‑up 3‑4 days per week
personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to office; uses hybrid schedule to reduce commuting
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild hypertension – monitors BP, regular check‑ups, maintains exercise routine
personal_factors.career_motivation: Build high‑performing engineering teams, progress to Director of Talent Acquisition

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: Twice‑weekly 30‑minute sync with hiring managers; weekly 1‑hour talent‑ops stand‑up
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but supportive; balances candidness with empathy
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Hosts monthly lunch‑and‑learns; contributes to internal recruiting wiki

potential_bottlenecks: Delayed feedback from hiring managers during peak hiring cycles
Limited capacity when multiple senior roles open simultaneously
burnout_risk_factors: Erosion of work‑life boundaries due to remote flexibility
